item.title: ‘They hate our generation’: My son and daughter-in-law want us to sell our house — and move to Oregon to start a commune
item.description: “They have spent thousands of dollars taking month-long earthship-building classes.”

item.title: I’m carpooling with a friend for a conference. His expenses are covered. Should I offer to pay him for gas?
item.description: “Normally I’d offer to cover a meal or a portion of the gas.”

item.title: Bank of America says fund managers have suffered a ‘bull crash.’ What that means for stocks.
item.description: Fund managers have had all the optimism drained out of them, and rapidly as well.

item.title: ‘I’ll retire when I’m dead’: My 401(k) lost $50,000 in the market turmoil. I’m in my early 40s. What should I do now?
item.description: “I have no clue how the funds in my 401(k) are invested.”

item.title: BYD shares rise as Chinese EV maker unveils 5-minute charge
item.description: Shares of BYD, the world’s largest electric-vehicle maker by deliveries, rose on Tuesday after the Chinese company said it’s rolling out a system that...
